name: Katerfrühstück
description: You woke up after a relaxed evening with your friends. You don't remember much, but as far as you know you only drank some soda and watched tv. Now Your parents are about to come for a visit. Hurry up an get em out of the door before your family arrives. Use WASD to move, SPACE to pick things up or put em where they belong. Press M for menu screen.
